+20 瞄准辅助、-20% 瞄准圆锥范围、[?] 瞄准时的操控性，持续 5 秒。

该增益持续时间无法被刷新。

descriptions.en: An explosive grenade that sticks to surfaces and detonates when targets pass through its laser trigger, dealing damage and moderately scorching them.

Sun Invictus buff from Sunspots lasts twice as long (5 ->10 seconds)

Sunspots affect the entire team.
Rounds fired split into tracking cluster missiles upon detonation.
Fires a stream of sentient, toxic projectiles that track the targeted enemy.
[Shoot]  : Fire grenades. Release to detonate all live grenades simultaneously. Grenades stick to surfaces and set targets on fire.

While above 50% Magazine:
Direct Hits create a Stasis burst which applies 50 Slow for <:pve:922884406073507930>4 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[1.5] seconds to enemies within [?] meters.

Only activates once per shot.
(Wolfpack Rounds can activate is a second time)

Whisper of Durance increases slow duration by <:pve:922884406073507930>8 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[2] seconds
descriptions.zh-chs:
前半弹匣直接命中敌人时：
将产生一个冰影爆炸，附近 [?] 米内的敌人获得 50 层减速效果。持续 <:pve:922884406073507930>4 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[1.5] 秒。

每次射击仅触发一次效果。
（狼群弹药可触发多次。）

耐久之吟 可将持续时间增加到 <:pve:922884406073507930>8 <:pvp:922884468275019856>[2] 秒。

descriptions.en:
Dive to the ground and create a burst of Solar Light that cures nearby allies.

While Heat Rises is active, you gain restoration while diving and scorch targets upon landing.
Conjure a well of power that increases weapon damage for those inside it.
Conjure a well of power that continuously heals those inside it.

Reviving or being revived grants you and allies within 15 metres a 100HP Overshield for 10 seconds.
Leaving the 15 metres radius removes Overshield
If the wearer loses Overshield, so too does everyone else.

Heals you and allies within 15 metres for 60(?)HP after getting a Weapon Kill with a Matching Subclass Element with a 3 second cooldown.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
Oversized Sidearm with extended-range, heavy-caliber rounds. Fires full auto with increased rate of fire. Deals increased precision damage to unshielded targets.

While Last Guardian Standing or Solo:

20 Reload, 20 Stability, 10 Aim Assist, and 10 Range.
descriptions.zh-chs:
当你成为火力战队最后存活的成员或单刷时：

可提高 20 填装速度、 20 稳定性、 10 瞄准辅助和 10 射程。

descriptions.en: A grenade that sticks to any surface and emits bolts of lightning.

After being in Combat for 12 seconds:
15% Increased Damage, +50 Handling, and +50 Reload Speed.

Lasts until you're out of combat and works while stowed.

Being in Combat is defined as having either dealt or received damage within 5 seconds.

Upon blocking an attack within 0.5 seconds of starting to Block:
50% Increased damage for 2 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
做出防御动作的 0.5 秒内成功格挡敌人伤害：
+50% 伤害，持续 2 秒。

descriptions.en: +7.77% Damage against Elites, Minibosses, and Bosses
descriptions.zh-chs: 提高 7.77% 对强大的战斗人员、首领和载具的伤害。

descriptions.en:
Hybrid melee/ranged polearm with a frontal shield.
Generates energy on dealing ranged damage.

[Aim Down Sights]  : Raise shield, depleting energy over time
[Melee]  : Kinetic melee combo
One-shot handheld Grenade Launcher. Projectiles release a wave of energy when they contact the ground.
Grenade detonation has a brief blinding effect.
descriptions.zh-chs: 榴弹爆炸可产生短暂失明效果。

descriptions.en:
[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy projectile attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

Splits 50% of Damage into an Explosive Damage portion that deals 30% increased damage and has no damage falloff.

<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 15% Body Shot Damage Increase. Precision Damage Increase varies depending on Precision Multiplier.

<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] Total damage remains the same.
descriptions.zh-chs:
将 50% 原伤害量，转换为爆炸伤害，该爆炸伤害提升 30% 伤害量。
引爆延迟和距离相关。

<:pve:922884406073507930>[PVE] 实际增加 15% 命中身体的伤害。 精准伤害的提升量根据武器类型变化。

<:pvp:922884468275019856>[PVP] 总伤害量不变（即只有射程上的收益）。

descriptions.en:
Upon finishing a reload within 6 seconds of a Precision Kill:
Delay after shooting is reduced by 30%, increasing Rate of Fire for 6 seconds.
Buff can be refreshed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
在精准击杀后 6 秒内装填：
提高射速（降低 30% 射击间隔），持续 6 秒。
该增益可以被刷新。

descriptions.en:
Recurve Bow. Draw quickly and move faster while this weapon is equipped.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

While holding down the trigger:
Every successive shot grants -10% Accuracy Cone Size and +1 Stability, up to -100% Accuracy Cone Size and +10 Stability after firing 10 shots.

Effect at maximum strength removes all spread.
Projectiles fired by this weapon blight the target or nearby area on impact.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Upon dealing damage with all your weapons within [?] seconds of each:
35% increased damage for 10 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
在 [?] 秒内使用所有武器造成伤害后：
提高 35% 该武器伤害，持续 10 秒。

descriptions.en: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : Change this weapon's damage type, cycling between Solar, Arc, and Void.

Energy Weapons are refunded 1 Ammo upon hitting Matching Elemental Shields.

Upon breaking a Combatant, Barrier, or Guardian Shield: Refills magazine.
descriptions.zh-chs:
打破战斗人员、勇士、或守护者的护盾时：重新装填弹匣。

若能量武器与战斗护盾元素类型吻合，击中目标时可重生弹药。

descriptions.en: Passively grants 20 Stability and -30 Reload Speed.
Radar stays active while aiming down sights.

Upon blocking damage with your Glaive Shield:
20% increased projectile damage for 4 seconds or until you stop blocking.

Blocking any hit refreshes the duration.

Upon reaching 3 points with Weapon Kills:
Starts Health Regeneration and heals for ~80 HP

Rank-And-File Combatants give 1 point.
Guardians give 2 points.
Elites/Minibosses/Bosses give 3 points.

Weapon Kills must be within 5 seconds of each.
descriptions.zh-chs:
武器连续击杀 3 名敌人时：
开始生命恢复，恢复总值约为 80 点。

普通敌人记为 1 个击杀。
守护者记为 2 个击杀。
精英、强大敌人、首领记为 3 个击杀。

连续击杀敌人需在 5 秒内完成。

descriptions.en:
+10 Aim Assist 1x mod
+15 Aim Assist 2x mods
-15% Accuracy Cone Size
-25% ADS Animation Duration

Compound Bow. Longer draw time optimized for damage.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.
Rapid precision hits create a lightning storm at the point of impact.

If hipfiring:
• 20% Increased:
    • Aim Assist Falloff Distance
    • Reticle Stickiness Falloff Distance
    • Damage Falloff Start and End Distance
• -15% Accuracy Cone Size
• +15 Aim Assist
• +2.7 degrees Precision Angle Threshold
• +25 Stability

Damage Falloff Multipliers do not apply to The Last Word, Shotguns, Sniper Rifles, and Fusion Rifles.
Landing multiple rockets loads a grenade. [Alternate Weapon Action]  to switch into Grenade Launcher mode.

Loads 2 Ammo at a time.
Reduces Reload Speed by 35.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

15% Magazine Refresh, +20 Range, and +30 Stability for 3 seconds or until firing.
Only active for the first shot.

Incurs a 0.3 second cooldown after activation but can be reactivated multiple times during a slide by shooting quickly.
descriptions.zh-chs:
滑行时：
重新装填 15% 弹匣，+20 射程，+30 稳定性，持续 3 秒或直到开枪。
仅第一发子弹有效。

0.3 秒冷却时间，但一次滑行中快速射击可触发多次该特性效果。

descriptions.en: Final blows with this weapon generate a slowing burst around the defeated target.
This weapon fires special shield-piercing ammunition. It comes with a scope. Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

Grants 1 Stack of Explosive Light per Orb of Power Pickup, granting increased damage and +100 Blast Radius.

Maximum of 6 Stacks. Consumes 1 Stack per Shot.

Grenade Launchers: 65% to 84% Increased explosive damage. Increases overall damage by 52%.

Rocket Launchers: 25% Increased impact and explosive damage.
descriptions.zh-chs:
每拾取 1 个能量球获取 1 层爆炸光能，提升伤害并 +100 爆炸范围。

最高叠加 6 层。每次射击消耗 1 层。

榴弹发射器：提升 65% 至 84% 爆炸伤害。总伤害量提升约为 52%。

火箭发射器：提升 25% 冲击伤害和爆炸伤害。

descriptions.en: A grenade that detonates on impact, releasing multiple drones that seek nearby targets. Each drone slightly scorches affected targets.

On hit against Rank-And-File Combatants:
Grants 1 Stack of Redirection, up to a maximum of 20 Stacks.

On hit against Elite, Miniboss, or Boss Combatants:
Grants 20% increased damage per stack, up to 100% at 5 Stacks.

Consumes 1 stack per hit if at or below 5 stacks.
Consumes 5 stacks per hit if at or above 6 stacks.
descriptions.zh-chs:
命中普通敌人时：
获得 1 层转向增益，最高叠加 10 层。

命中精英、次级首领、首领敌人时：
每层增益 +20% 伤害，最高 100%。

当增益层数不高于 5 层时，每次命中消耗 1 层增益。
当增益层数高于 5 层时，每次命中消耗 5 层增益。

descriptions.en:
+10 Aim Assist 1x mod
+15 Aim Assist 2x mods

-25% ADS Animation Duration
+5 Impact
Shoots erratic bullets from all gun barrels at the same time.
+5 Aim Assistance
descriptions.zh-chs: +5 瞄准辅助

descriptions.en: A bolt of Void Light that forks on impact into smaller bolts that seek out targets.

Hipfiring this weapon fires multiple tracking projectiles.
Targets marked by these projectiles explode upon death, or when struck by another Sacred Flame's explosion.

Enables hipfiring while in Lift, and passively grants +50 Airborne Effectiveness while hipfiring.

Increases Lift Duration to 4 seconds.

Lift Duration in seconds:
High Lift: 2.6 -> 4 (54% increase)
Stafe Lift: 2.2 -> 4 (82% increase)
Catapult Lift: 1 -> 4 (300% increase!)

Increases Slide Distance by 33%

After sprinting for 1.5 seconds, gain Linear Actuators for 7 seconds.

On Melee Hit:
Linear Actuators applies Shocked for 2 seconds on enemy, which releases an Arc Static Charge that chains when another enemy is within 20 metres. Shocked is refreshed on chain.

[PVE] [?] Damage
[PVP] 85 Damage. Immune to additional chain damage for 2 seconds while Shocked.

Increases Sprint Speed by 6.25%
Increases Slide Distance by 33%
descriptions.zh-chs:
冲刺 1.5 秒后，获得"线性促动器"，持续 7 秒。

在近战命中时:
"线性促动器"对敌人施加震荡 2 秒，释放一个连锁电弧，当另一个敌人在 20 米范围内时就会连锁。震荡会在连锁时被刷新。

[PVE] [?] 伤害
[PVP] 85 伤害。在震荡状态下对额外的连锁伤害免疫，持续 2 秒。

+6.25% 冲刺速度
+33% 滑行距离

descriptions.en: This weapon does more damage to enemies based on the number of SIVA nanites that attach to them.

Compound Bow. Longer draw time optimized for damage.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.
Create a large barrier that can be used to reinforce a position with cover from enemy fire.
Create a small barrier that you can peek over while aiming down sights and that increases weapon reload speed, stability, and range when you stand behind it.
Fires a single-slug round. This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.

Scoring 4 Precision Hits within 2.5 seconds of each grants Aeon Weapon Haste for 6 seconds.

Aeon Weapon Haste grants +10 Reload (w/ 0.8x Duration Multiplier), as well as +10 Handling to Ready and Stow Speed.

On Champion Stun, Mini-Boss, or Boss Kill:
• Allies within 30 metres gain 50% Grenade and Melee Energy.

4 second cooldown between activations.

在 2.5 秒内完成 4 次精准攻击会获得“永劫教派武器加速”增益，持续6秒。

“永劫教派武器加速”提供 +10 填装速度（附带 0.8x 填装动画系数），对拔枪/收枪动作 +10 操控性。

在击晕勇士、次级首领或者首领时：
• 30 米范围内的队友获得 50% 的手雷和近战能量。
• 永劫教派队友额外获得 10% 的超量能量。

触发间隔 4 秒。

descriptions.en:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

Explosion disorients enemies within 7 metres for 5 seconds

打破属性相匹配的元素护盾时：
爆炸可使 7 米范围内敌人迷失方向，持续 5 秒。

descriptions.en: Hard-hitting twin-fire rounds.

+100 Handling (Ready Speed), and Radar remains active.

被动提升 +30 空中效率。

+100 操控性（对拔枪动作），并且使雷达保持活跃状态。

•  Arrows fired while aiming down sights cause Sacred Flames to instantly detonate.

Rellena el arma, si esta guardada, luego de 2.5 segundos

descriptions.en:
Increases Grenade Impact Damage by 50%.

Due to the ratio of Exlosive and Impact Damage being tied to the Blast Radius Stat on Grenade Launchers, a lower Blast Radius will provide a higher overall damage increase.

Breech-Loaded GLs:

Drum-Loaded GLs:

+50% 榴弹直击伤害。

因爆炸伤害和直击伤害的比例和榴弹发射器“爆炸范围”属性相关，故尖刺榴弹起作用时，更低的爆炸范围可造成更高的总伤害。

• Bows are granted 15% Decreased Draw Time for 6 seconds.
• Swords are granted 15(?)% Faster Charge Rate for 6 seconds.

Veist Stinger Activation Chances:
• Auto Rifle, Submachine Gun: 2%
• Sidearm: 4%
• Bow, Linear Fusion Rifle: 10%
descriptions.zh-chs:
VEIST 尖刺：
• 使用备弹重新填装弹匣，4 秒冷却时间。
• 弓箭 -15% 蓄力时间，持续 6 秒。
• 刀剑加快 [15?]% 充能效率，持续 6 秒。

触发概率：
自动步枪、冲锋枪： 2%
收枪： 4%
弓箭、线性融合步枪： 10%

descriptions.en:
Upon getting a Guardian Kill while below 63 HP:
Grants you Enhanced Radar and removes you from passively appearing in opposing radar for 10 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
低于 63 点生命值时，守护者使用此武器造成最后一击：
在 10 秒内提供强化雷达，并将你从敌方雷达上移除。

descriptions.en: Fires a grenade projectile that bounces and detonates on trigger release.

Compound Bow. Longer draw time optimized for damage.
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
+10 Stability
Kills refill the magazine, increase damage for a short duration, and grant Super energy based on the strength of String of Curses. Fires full-auto.

Upon finishing a reload:
+40 Handling and 20% Flinch Resistance for 6 seconds.

Cannot be refreshed. Persists while stowed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
完成填装时：
在 6 秒内为此武器提供额外 40 操控性、 20% 后仰抖动抗性。

持续时间无法被刷新。收起武器时仍然有效。

descriptions.en: Landing a final blow or multiple precision hits triggers a burst that poisons nearby targets.
Throw a fan of flaming knives that scorch targets on hit.
Throw a knife that attaches to surfaces upon impact and explodes when it detects a nearby target.
Quickly throw a knife that deals moderate damage. Precision hits with this knife make you radiant for a short duration.

Throw a knife that deals extra precision damage and causes scorched targets to ignite.

Precision final blows with this knife immediately recharge your class ability.
Active only in the "Garden of Salvation" raid.

On Dodge:
Applies Misdirection to enemies within 22 metres.

Effects of Misdirection:
• [PVE] Disorients minors and elites for 5 seconds.
• [PVP] Warps audio and removes radar for 5 seconds, as well as briefly blinding.

Misdirection doesn't actually do damage.
(Less than 0.001 at the very least)
descriptions.zh-chs:
躲闪时：
向 22 米范围内的敌人施加迷惑。

迷惑的效果：
• [PVE] 使普通和精英敌人混乱5秒。
• [PVP] 扭曲声音并在 5 秒内移除雷达，并短暂致盲。

迷惑不会造成伤害。

descriptions.en:
After dealing non-Precision Weapon Damage:
8% Increased Precision Damage and +[?] Aim Assist for 0.55 seconds.
Dealing additional Non-Precision Damage refreshes the timer.
This weapon fires explosive rounds and highlights targets that take damage from Sunshot.

Increased Super Energy from Orbs of Power.
7.1% -> 10% for Super Orbs
2.5% -> 4.17% for Small Orbs

While Super Energy is full:
Picking up an Orb of Power grants an Overcharge stack.

Each Overcharge stack grants increased Super Damage, up to 70%:
27.3% | 54.6% | 62.3% | 70%

Casting Super while Overcharged heals you for 95 to 200 HP based on Overcharge Stacks.

Casting Super while at 4 Overcharge Stacks grants you a 100HP Overshield for 16 seconds.

Casting Super removes all Overcharge stacks.

After Damaging 3 Separate Enemies within 3 seconds of each:
35% Increased Damage for 10 seconds.
Buff can't be refreshed.
descriptions.zh-chs:
3 秒内命中 3 个不同目标：
+35% 伤害，持续 10 秒。

该增益无法被刷新。

descriptions.en: When upgraded to a Masterwork, this weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

While within 15 metres of an enemy:
~15 Stability, 15 Reload, and 0.75x Handling Animation Duration Multiplier.

While within 15 metres of 2+ enemies:
~40 Stability, 55 Reload, and 0.56x Handling Animation Duration Multiplier.
descriptions.zh-chs:
15 米内有 1 个敌人时：
~15 稳定性、15 装填速度、0.75x 操作动画系数。

15 米内有 2 个以上敌人时：
~40 稳定性、55 装填速度、0.56x 操作动画系数。

descriptions.en:
[Heavy Attack]  : Fire a heavy projectile attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.
Hard-hitting, high recoil. Increases rate of fire after kill.

This mod's perks are only active in the "Vault of Glass" raid.

Multiple copies of this mod stack and improve its effects.

This mod's perks are only active in the "Vault of Glass" raid.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.

On Weapon or Melee Kill:
6.7% | 13.3% | 20% | 26.6% | 33.3% Increased Damage for 4.5 seconds.

Buff is refreshed on Weapon or Melee Kill. Melee Kills grant 5 stacks.
descriptions.zh-chs:
完成武器或近战击杀：
提升 6.7% | 13.3% | 20% | 26.6% | 33.3% 伤害，持续 4.5 秒。

击杀可刷新持续时间，近战击杀直接获得 5 层增益效果。

descriptions.en: Recoil pattern on this weapon is more predictably vertical. Fires a 4-round burst.

After 3 Powered Hits within [2?] seconds of each:
Gain +1 Ammo.
+7.77% Damage against Rank-And-File
descriptions.zh-chs: 提高 7.77% 对普通敌人的伤害。

descriptions.en:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
40 Reload Stat while Out-of-Combat
descriptions.zh-chs: 脱离战斗时获得 40 装填速度。

descriptions.en:
Powered Melee Hits instantly cast Smoke Bomb.
Thrown Smoke Bombs deal 50% increased damage.
Quickfall does not receive increased damage.

Standing in the Smoke Bomb's Cloud grants Truesight for 3 seconds, allowing you to see enemy outlines through walls from up to 64 metres away.

After being in Combat for 12 seconds:
15% Increased Damage, +50 Handling, and +50 Reload Speed.

Lasts until you're out of combat and works while stowed.

Being in Combat is defined as having either dealt or received damage within 5 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
持续处于 战斗状态 12 秒后：
+15% 伤害， +50 操控性，+50 填装速度。

持续到脱离战斗，收枪状态也会触发。

战斗状态的定义为：造成或受到伤害 5 秒内。

descriptions.en: Targets killed with Sunshot explode in Solar energy.

0.5x ADS Animation Scalar for Primary Weapons
0.75x ADS Animation Scalar for Special Weapons

Fires a slower grenade projectile that bounces.
[Shoot]  : Fire; release to detonate.

Passively grants +30 Reload Speed with a 0.9x Duration Multiplier.

Decreases Magazine Size Stat by 20.
descriptions.zh-chs:
+30 填装速度，-10% 装填动画持续时间。

-20 弹匣容量。

descriptions.en: Active only in the "Garden of Salvation" raid.
Improved weapon performance and greatly increased recovery when its wielder is the last living member of a fireteam.
Kills with this weapon generate stunning lighting strikes from above. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

Finder Bricks give 75% less ammo.
Kills increase % then at 100% brick spawns

% Multipliers
Primary Weapons Kills 1.25x
Exotic Primary Weapons 1.67x

Percentage per Kill:
**<:heavy:968793055652106320> Pover weapons**

**Special weapons**

2x 6.6% > 11%. Average of 15 Kills.
Passively grants 20 Aim Assist and -30 Range.
descriptions.zh-chs: +20 辅助瞄准，-30 射程。

descriptions.en: Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with a strong initial boost of speed.
Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with strong directional control.
Jump while airborne to activate Glide and start an airborne drift with both moderate speed and directional control.

Receiving [20?] damage grants a stack of Bitterspite, up to 5 stacks.

Bitterspite increases Reload Speed based on stacks, all of which expire upon reloading or stowing.
descriptions.zh-chs:
受到 [20?] 伤害可获得一层苦涩怨恨，最多叠加 5 次。

增加的装填速度与苦涩怨恨叠加的层数相关，当重新装填或收起武器后将失效。

descriptions.en: Customized frame with dramatically increased accuracy, stability, and targeting while hip firing.

[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy uppercut attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

Allies within 24 metres receive 25% Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate.

On Super Ability Activation:
Fully restores Health, Grenade, Melee, and Class Ability Energy.
descriptions.zh-chs:
24 米范围内的队友获得额外 25% 的基础职业技能恢复速度。

在施放超能时：
完全恢复生命值，以及手雷、近战、职业技能的能量。

descriptions.en: Powered Swords gain +1 Ammo every other kill.

This weapon fires full auto.
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : Swap to Arc Seeker mode. Arc Seekers track toward combatants you target.

Move forward at 90% your speed while blocking with Sentinel Shield.

Converts incoming damage into Super Energy after Super ends, up to 50%.

Overshields prevent damage into Super Energy conversion so don't stand in a Well of Radiance.
This weapon fires [Stagger] staggering projectiles. Strong against Unstoppable Champions.
An explosive grenade that attaches to targets.

While Aiming-Down-Sights:
Increased Bodyshot Damage, -55% Aim Assist Cone Size.

Bodyshot damage increase:
• Auto Rifle, Bow, Hand Cannon: 20%
• Pulse Rifle, Sidearm, Submachine Gun: 10%

On Weapon Kill:
+20 Range, +50 Mobility, +40 Handling, and a 5% Increased Damage Falloff Distance

Lasts 5 seconds, additional kills add 5 seconds, maxing out at 8 seconds.
This weapon creates SIVA nanite swarms on rapid hits and precision kills.

Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
Hurl your Void Shield toward a target. The shield can ricochet off targets and surfaces, granting Overshield for each target hit.
After sprinting for a short time, use this melee ability to unleash a devastating Shield Bash that suppresses the target. Final blows with Shield Bash grant an Overshield.

Passively grants 30 Airborne Effectiveness to Fusion Rifles and Linear Fusion Rifles.

Fusion Rifle and Linear Fusion Rifle kills grant Radiant for 7.5 seconds.

Icarus Dash refreshes all your weapons.

This mod's perks are only active in the "Vow of the Disciple" raid.

Multiple copies of this mod stack and improve its effects.

Thundercrash deals 100% increased damage.

On Thundercrash Deactivation:
Gain a 100 HP Overshield for 7 seconds.
Overshield duration scales with Thundercrash distance, up to 20 seconds.
descriptions.zh-chs:
雷霆冲击提升 100% 伤害。

当雷霆冲击释放完成时：
在 7 秒内获得 100 生命值的覆盖护盾。
覆盖护盾持续时间会根据雷霆冲击释放距离而延长，最高为 20 秒。

descriptions.en:
On Weapon Kill:
Refreshes 10% of Magazine on most weapons.

The magazine refresh is increased to 17% on Submachine Guns and Auto Rifles.

While in Arc Staff:
• Blocking with Whirlwind Guard doesn't consume extra Super Energy.
• 50% reduced Super Drain

Can deactivate Arc Staff at any time to preserve a portion of unspent Super Energy.
Instantaneous Deactivation refunds 62.5% Super Energy.

While Last Guardian Standing:
Kills refill 100% of Magazine Capacity.

Passively grants +30 Magazine stat.
descriptions.zh-chs:
如果你是火力战队中唯一生还的成员：
每次最后一击都会刷新弹匣。

被动提升 +30 弹夹容量。

descriptions.en:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat combatants while using this weapon in Arc, Solar, and Void modes to unlock this upgrade.

Defeating combatants in the Throne World, PsiOps Battlegrounds, or the "Vox Obscura" Exotic quest will unlock these objectives faster. Defeating Champions provides bonus progress to all 3 objectives.

[Super]  : Summon a shield of Void Light.
While Sentinel Shield is active:
[Light Attack]  : Attack.
[Block]  : Block.
[Grenade]  : Perform a Shield Throw.

Guard with Sentinel Shield to create a defensive wall. Allies who shoot through the wall have increased weapon damage, and guarding allies makes the shield last longer.
Create an indestructible dome to protect you and your allies. Passing through Ward of Dawn grants you and your allies a temporary increase to weapon damage.

Automatically queues up the next shot after firing if you hold the trigger.

10% Faster Rate of Fire on Shotguns exclusively.
descriptions.zh-chs:
扣住扳机时将以全自动模式进行射击。

使用霰弹枪时会提高 10% 射速。

descriptions.en:
Upgrades this weapon to a Masterwork. Once upgraded, the weapon will obtain enhanced capabilities, such as increased stats and/or additional perks.

Defeat targets using this weapon to unlock this upgrade.
+10 Handling

On Weapon Kill:
15% Increased damage for 7 seconds.

Matching Grenade and Powered Melee Kills while the buff is active grant 50% increased damage for 10 seconds.
Can only be refreshed by getting another Matching Ability Kill.

On Weapon Kill:
Applies 30 Scorch to enemies within [?] meters.
Ember of Ashes increases this to 40 Scorch.

Killing Powerful Combatants and Players increases the range to 8 meters.

Damage from Scorch can be increased through Weapon Damage Buffs, Debuffs, and Combatant Rank Modifiers.
descriptions.zh-chs:
使用此武器造成最后一击时：
对 [?] 米范围内的敌人造成 30 层灼烧效果。
骨灰余烬会将灼烧效果增加到 40 层。

击杀强大的战斗人员或敌方守护者可将范围增加到 8 米。

灼烧伤害可以因武器特性、敌人负面效果、战斗人员阶级而增加。
